doc.title: Backtracker
doc.plot: A lone rider appears at a ranch . The priest who lives there levels his rifle The rider slumps to the ground. Blood on his coat, bullet in his side. The priest takes the stranger in to tend his wounds. But he is in for a shock as that stranger is none other than the ogre from his childhood. Should he take revenge or show forgiveness? The priest struggles to chose as the terror of his past becomes clearer by the minute. A lone rider appears at a ranch . The priest who lives there levels his rifle The rider slumps to the ground. Blood on his coat, bullet in his side. The priest takes the stranger in to tend his wounds. But he is in for a shock as that stranger is none other than the ogre from his childhood. Should he take revenge or show forgiveness? The priest struggles to chose as the terror of his past becomes clearer by the minute...
